## background
https://matplotlib.org/gallery/color/colormap_reference.html
df.style.background_gradient() # default is cmap='PuBu'
df.style.background_gradient((cmap='PuBu', low=0, high=0, axis=0, subset=None) # axis=0 means column gradient.
# uniform sequential cmap= 'plasma', 'inferno'
